definition: (theology) the act of delivering from sin or saving from evil
details:
noun
- (theology) the act of delivering from sin or saving from evil
= synonyms: redemption
- saving someone or something from harm or from an unpleasant situation
= example: saving someone or something from harm or from an unpleasant situation
- a means of preserving from harm or unpleasantness
= example: a means of preserving from harm or unpleasantness
- the state of being saved or preserved from harm
